    A

    Antics - Class in Unnamed Package
    The Antics class provides a simple console-based menu that allows the user to perform various string operations.
    Antics() - Constructor for class Antics
     

    C

    capitalizeFirstLetter(String) - Static method in class Antics
    Capitalizes only the first letter of the given string.

    I

    isAbecedarian(String) - Static method in class Antics
    Says whether a given string is abecedarian.
    isPalindrome(String) - Static method in class Antics
    Says whether a given string is a palindrome.
    isPangram(String) - Static method in class Antics
    Says whether a given string is a pangram.

    The entry point of the program.
